entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, trying to open a door.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who tries to help him open the door using magic.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another friend of Harry's, who joins in trying to force the door open.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person whose knife is used by Harry to try and open the door.

relationships.description: Harry tries to force the door open, but it doesn't budge.
Hermione uses her wand to try and unlock the door.
Harry pulls out Sirius's knife from his robes and tries to use it to open the door.
